intro: Film the fright, survive the night!
description:
Content Warning: Scary Filming is a co-op horror game where you and your friends embark on a spine-chilling adventure to film terrifying content and go viral. Customize your face with the quirky ASCII face customizer, then dive into the unknown with your team. Armed with only your camera, you'll explore creepy environments filled with physics-driven monsters, cursed relics, and other horrifying discoveries.

Film as many terrifying moments as you can before you run out of battery, oxygen, or—worst of all—friends. After surviving the dangers, head back to the surface and watch your chaotic footage rack up views. The more terrifying content you capture, the more famous you become. Use your earnings to upgrade your gear, buy props, and unlock sponsorships to grow your fame even further.

Can you survive the horrors and make a name for yourself, or will you become just another spooky story?
